title: Are the DC Pandey physics class 11 & 12 books good for a NEET student? - Quora

response.answer_text: I solved DC Pandey in class 11&12 and found them really helpful for NEET. Pros of DC Pandey Questions given in DC Pandey are according to NEET pattern. Difficulty of questions increases gradually and motivates you to solve more and more. It covers all types of questions wether it's theoretical or numerical. Solutions given at the end of the chapter are quiet helpful . They are solved in shortest and easiest way in which it can be solved. This helps you in saving time. Cons of DC Pandey There are many mistakes in the answer key and you will waste your time in finding wether you are right aur the answer given in book is correct. This is the only disadvantage of DC Pandey. As pros are more than cons , so you can go for dc pandey.

DC Pandey is based for JEE MAINS + ADVANCED. You can use it because it contains easy - moderate level question( namely Level 1) which is asked in both JEE MAINS & NEET exams as well as tough level question( namely Level 2) for JEE ADVANCED. In this book, all the concepts are written to the point and it has lots of MCQs. It consists in 5 parts namely MECHANICS 1, MECHANICS 2, WAVES & THERMODYNAMICS, ELECTRICITY & MAGNETISM and OPTIC & MODERN PHYSICS. From my point of view, you can take it for practice the problems and if price does not matter.
Yes it is very good book If you solve the DC Pandey of both class 11 and 12 and then revise the books. You will easily get 150+ marks in neet.
